# cook your code here
import math
def prime(n):
    if n > 1:
        flag = 0 
        for i in xrange(2,int(math.sqrt(n))):
            if n%i == 0:
                flag = 1 
                break
        if flag == 0:
            return "Yes"
        else:
            return "No"
    else:
        return "No"
def palindrome(n):
    if str(n)[::-1] == str(n):
        return "Yes"
    else:
        return "No"
N = input()
while True:
    if N%2 != 0:
       if prime(N) == "Yes" and palindrome(N) == "Yes":
          print N
          break 
    N += 1
